div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icpc-2
CodeDisplay
R84
R85

Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10-cm
CodeDisplay
C00Malignant neoplasm of lip
C01Malignant neoplasm of base of tongue

Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
CodeDisplay
363505006Malignant tumor of oral cavity
363429002Malignant tumour of larynx
363353009Malignant tumor of gallbladder
